item.title: Service Blueprinting for Alignment
item.description: Capital One's wealth management team was struggling to launch. There wasn't an overarching understanding of all the moving parts between calendaring with Wealth Managers, backend infrastructure, and design requirements. I worked with my design team to create a single diagram outlining all the steps of the service experience, while tying in the underlying components needed to actually build the thing. The diagram illustrated a clear line between what the user would experience and all the underlying parts needed to make that experience a reality:
